blockPublicSecurityGroupRules.description:
Enable or disable EMR Block Public Access.

The following arguments are optional:

permittedPublicSecurityGroupRuleRanges.description: Configuration block for defining permitted public security group rule port ranges. Can be defined multiple times per resource. Only valid if `block_public_security_group_rules` is set to `true`.

permittedPublicSecurityGroupRuleRanges.description: Configuration block for defining permitted public security group rule port ranges. Can be defined multiple times per resource. Only valid if `block_public_security_group_rules` is set to `true`.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering BlockPublicAccessConfiguration resources.
